articles.author: Todd ArcherESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Dallas Cowboys named most valuable sports franchise at $7.64 billion
articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys are the most valuable franchise in sports as Sportico estimates the NFL team is worth $7.64 billion.
articles.content:
Jerry Jones has said he would never sell the Dallas Cowboys. If he ever changed his mind, Sportico has it valued at $7.64 billion, making it the most valuable franchise across all sports.

articles.author: Louie Estrada
articles.title: Bill Russell, basketball great who worked for civil rights, dies at 88
articles.description: Bill Russell was indomitable on and off the court and one of the most fascinating public figures to straddle sports and civil rights. He was intensely driven and innovative as an athlete.
articles.content: Throughout his basketball career, Bill Russell compiled a legacy of championship achievement unparalleled in any sport. As the dominant defensive player of his generation, he won an Olympic gold meda… [+11212 chars]
